collectors.title: Database
collectors.titleDetails: (6 total Queries, 6 of them unique across 1 Connection)

queries.sql: SELECT `pemesanan`.`id_p`, `pemesanan`.`id_u`, `pemesanan`.`nama`, `users`.`no_hp`, `pemesanan`.`bukti_pembayaran`, `pemesanan_detail`.`status`, `kategori`.`kategori`, SUM(pemesanan_detail.harga) as total_harga, GROUP_CONCAT(CONCAT( pemesanan_detail.jenis, " - ", `pemesanan_detail`.`model`, " - ", `pemesanan_detail`.`ukuran`, " - ", `pemesanan_detail`.`lengan`, " - Rp ", pemesanan_detail.harga ) SEPARATOR "|") AS detail_items FROM `pemesanan_detail` JOIN `pemesanan` ON `pemesanan`.`id_p` = `pemesanan_detail`.`id_p` JOIN `users` ON `users`.`id_u` = `pemesanan`.`id_u` JOIN `kategori` ON `kategori`.`id_ktg` = `pemesanan_detail`.`id_ktg` WHERE `pemesanan_detail`.`status` IN ('Selesai','Dibatalkan') AND DATE_FORMAT(pemesanan.tanggal_pemesanan, '%Y-%m') = '2025-06' GROUP BY `pemesanan`.`id_p` ORDER BY `pemesanan`.`id_p` DESC

timelineData.name: Query
timelineData.query: SELECT `pemesanan`.`id_p`, `pemesanan`.`id_u`, `pemesanan`.`nama`, `users`.`no_hp`, `pemesanan`.`bukti_pembayaran`, `pemesanan_detail`.`status`, `kategori`.`kategori`, SUM(pemesanan_detail.harga) as total_harga, GROUP_CONCAT(CONCAT( pemesanan_detail.jenis, " - ", `pemesanan_detail`.`model`, " - ", `pemesanan_detail`.`ukuran`, " - ", `pemesanan_detail`.`lengan`, " - Rp ", pemesanan_detail.harga ) SEPARATOR "|") AS detail_items FROM `pemesanan_detail` JOIN `pemesanan` ON `pemesanan`.`id_p` = `pemesanan_detail`.`id_p` JOIN `users` ON `users`.`id_u` = `pemesanan`.`id_u` JOIN `kategori` ON `kategori`.`id_ktg` = `pemesanan_detail`.`id_ktg` WHERE `pemesanan_detail`.`status` IN ('Selesai','Dibatalkan') AND DATE_FORMAT(pemesanan.tanggal_pemesanan, '%Y-%m') = '2025-06' GROUP BY `pemesanan`.`id_p` ORDER BY `pemesanan`.`id_p` DESC
